enchantment.sentient_pants.sentient_pant: On being damaged, the leggings will run off and attack entities. Right-click the pants entity to get the leggings (item) back.
gamerule.sentient_pants:drop_pants_on_de: Sentient Pants - Drop Leggings On Death
gamerule.sentient_pants:pants_seek_out_t: Sentient Pants - Pants Automatically Seek Out Target Enemies
gamerule.sentient_pants:return_on_death: Sentient Pants - Pants Return To Owner Upon Death
